site.title: SCW2 Mods Showcase
site.description: Complete collection of mods for Strip Club Wars 2

mods.name: Varied Dialogues
mods.author: Slaver0
mods.description: Transforms repetitive sexual dialogues into a dynamic psychological system with 400+ variations.
mods.longDescription: Uses character likes (rough sex, domination, submission) to generate unique dialogues. Also adds random variations when no likes are relevant.

mods.name: King Tut
mods.author: KingTut
mods.description: Comprehensive gameplay enhancement adding direct interactions, AI routines, and powerful cheat tools
mods.longDescription: Adds multiple gameplay features including direct job offers, workout/swimming together interactions, AI workout routines, financial aid system, stable relations auto-management, and an extensive cheat module for simplified gameplay without breaking game balance.
features: Direct job offers to any character
Extensive cheat module with character and MC options

mods.name: Cheats
mods.author: Unknown
mods.description: Simple cheat mod with two essential actions: restore full stamina and clean the club instantly
mods.longDescription: Adds two cheat actions to simplify gameplay: one button to restore all stamina (endurance) to maximum, and another to instantly clean the entire club (sets maintenance to 0). Perfect for players who want to skip the grind and focus on other aspects of the game.
features: Restore full stamina with one click

mods.name: Cherry Blossom Backgrounds
mods.author: Elkrose
mods.description: Complete background replacement pack featuring cherry blossom theme in stunning 4K quality
mods.longDescription: Transforms the entire visual atmosphere of Strip Club Wars 2 with a comprehensive cherry blossom themed background pack. Every single background in the game has been replaced with beautiful 4K quality images featuring cherry blossoms, creating a cohesive and immersive aesthetic throughout all locations.
features: Complete replacement of all game backgrounds
4K quality images for enhanced visual experience

mods.name: Christmas Backgrounds
mods.author: Elkrose
mods.description: Complete background replacement pack featuring festive Christmas theme in stunning 4K quality
mods.longDescription: Brings the holiday spirit to Strip Club Wars 2 with a comprehensive Christmas themed background pack. Every single background in the game has been replaced with beautiful 4K quality images featuring winter and Christmas decorations, creating a festive and immersive atmosphere throughout all locations.
features: Complete replacement of all game backgrounds
Festive Christmas and winter theme throughout
4K quality images for enhanced visual experience
Cohesive holiday aesthetic across all locations

mods.name: Harem
mods.author: QSonic
mods.description: Harem management system that automatically maintains loyalty and harmony among romantic partners
mods.longDescription:
How it works

When you interact with an NPC who is a romantic partner, they will now have a new interaction called Maintain Harem. Clicking this interaction will automatically update all your romantic partners to have max Loyalty. In addition, they will all have their opinions for Polyamory, Submissive, and Incest set to Love (2).

Further, every member of your harem will then have the following relation updates applied:

1. Rival and Enemy relationships between Harem members will be removed.
2. Harem members will all become Friends.
3. The following relationship modifiers will be applied:
   - Extended Family
   - My Friend

This will also consume a tick and some energy.

Effects

Hopefully, this will reduce the amount of infighting between harem members. It certainly should decrease the number of partners asking you to break up with existing partners, and will slightly rectify pre-existing bad blood between such NPCs. It doesn't completely eliminate friction -- partially because I think it's more realistic, and partially because I can't be arsed to write more comprehensive logic for it right now.

I don't foresee any complications with the running of the game, but please note that I have a) not tested this comprehensively and b) not searched for edge cases at all. While it should be fine to add/remove mid-playthrough, it would be wise to maintain a backed-up save in case of unpleasantness.

Installation

Extract harem.zip anywhere. Place the harem.tfl file in your tfel folder.

To uninstall, delete the harem.tfl file.

Further Plans?

None right now. Between classes and work I don't have a lot of time to work on a fully-fledged mod. This has been a fun little aside, as it were. But if there's interest in a more complete overhaul I could be convinced (for a crisp twenty dollar bill) to devote more time to it, though anything like that would have to wait til my exams are over in Feb 2026. That said, if I make any improvements to it for my own use, I'll be sure to update y'all as well.
features: Automatically sets all partners to max loyalty
Removes rivalry and enemy relationships between partners
Converts all harem members to friends

mods.name: Ice1 v2
mods.author: Ice1
mods.description: Ice1 image pack version 2. WARNING: Remove Ice1 v1 before installing this pack.
mods.longDescription:
Complete image pack by Ice1 featuring high-quality character images and visual replacements for Strip Club Wars 2.

IMPORTANT: If you have Ice1 v1 installed, you must remove it before installing this v2 pack to avoid conflicts and ensure proper functionality.

mods.name: Threesome Mod
mods.author: teuitonicdude
mods.description: When a character sees two others having sex, it can interrupt them and JOIN them in a threesome!
mods.longDescription: When a character sees two others having sex, it can interrupt them and JOIN them in a threesome! Particularly awesome when your girlfriend surprises you in bed with someone else.
features: Characters can interrupt and join ongoing sexual encounters
Enhances relationship dynamics and gameplay immersion

mods.name: Cheats Compilation
mods.author: Philash
mods.description: Compilation of several other cheat mods with multiple powerful cheat options
mods.longDescription: A comprehensive cheat compilation that combines multiple cheat functionalities into one convenient package. This mod includes various powerful cheat options to enhance your gameplay experience and simplify management tasks.
features: Boost all player stats and likes
Boost all NPC stats and likes
Clear club maintenance with one click
